titles.title: Nanotechnology Regulatory Science Act of 2011
A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to establish a nanotechnology regulatory science program.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6332-6333)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 10/6/2011--Introduced. Nanotechnology Regulatory Science Act of 2011 - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act (FFDCA) to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS) to establish within the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) a program for the scientific investigation of nanomaterials included or intended for inclusion in products regulated under the FFDCA to address: (1) the potential toxicology of such materials; (2) the effects of such materials on biological systems; and (3) the interaction of such materials with biological systems.
